duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform commissioning and qualification of bio/pharmaceutical equipment, including various systems for medical/buffer preparation, fermentation, cell harvest, ultra-filtration, chromatography, CIP, SIP, TFF, Chromatography, and Centrifuge Systems.
Develop risk assessment, system impact assessments, validation plans, protocols, and reports that support the qualification and validation of systems.
Review, analyze, and interpret system performance data for completed validation and prepare final report packages by summarizing the data.
Investigate deviations, write investigation reports, and create summary reports.
Promote cGMP and regulatory compliance into assigned projects.
Exercise good judgment within defined practices and policies in selecting methods and techniques for obtaining solutions.
Hands-on Experience with Biopharma Process Equipment.

education_certification.credential: BS degree or higher in Chemical Engineering or a related engineering or scientific discipline, or significant related experience
